description: Angel Yard is a versatile and creative communal hub. Located within Snell's Park in Edmonton, it provides a place for people to develop and share their skills, whilst enriching the community and strengthening social bonds, as people from diverse backgrounds come together to collaborate and learn.

events.name: Transforming Trash to Treasure: Upcycling Workshop

factsheet.heading: Transforming Trash to Treasure: Upcycling Workshop
paragraphs: Join Artist Tara in a workshop to celebrate Angel Yard’s story – a metamorphosis of a derelict garage into a now vibrant hub for new businesses, food, and creativity. Workshop participants will explore the theme of transformation by repurposing discarded materials into unique art pieces, symbolising renewal and growth.
This event is part of Enfield Creatives’ Collection.
This co curated Collection has been made possible with support from the Enfield Society and UKSP funding.

location.address: Angel Yard, 34 Snells Park, Edmonton, N18 2FD
travel_info: Train: Silver Street, White Hart Lane

name: Transforming Trash to Treasure: Upcycling Workshop
